meanings.definition: The act of removing a product from its packaging.
meanings.sent1: I love the excitement of unboxing a new toy.
meanings.sent2: She filmed herself unboxing the latest smartphone.
meanings.sent3: The unboxing of the gift revealed a surprise inside.
meanings.sent4: Unboxing a present is like opening a treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The unboxing experience was so satisfying.

meanings.definition: The process of unveiling and revealing the contents of a box.
meanings.sent1: Unboxing a mystery package can be thrilling.
meanings.sent2: We gathered around to watch the unboxing of the mysterious box.
meanings.sent3: The unboxing event turned out to be full of unexpected items.
meanings.sent4: Unboxing the box felt like discovering a hidden secret.
meanings.sent5: The unboxing ceremony was a moment of great anticipation.
